previewArticle.title: Toronto FC vs. Colorado Rapids | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Toronto FC 0, Colorado Rapids 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Toronto FC vs. Colorado Rapids

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We're underway. Follow the 4pm action. #PHIvRSL: http://t.co/P7PsANBTxS #TORvCOL: http://t.co/gfnDXxBONJ #MTLvCHI: http://t.co/sTZ4KVG8yR

timelineItems.comment: Issey Nakajima-Farran (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nathan Sturgis (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Dwayne De Rosario (Toronto FC) header from the center of the box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: De Rosario can’t get on the end of Jackson’s cross

timelineItems.name: TFC ASN
timelineItems.text: And another corner good pressure by #tfc #TFClive

timelineItems.name: twenteen
timelineItems.text: LETS GO REDSSSSSSS @TORONTOFC #tfclive http://t.co/bM4lYm8GvJ

timelineItems.name: twenteen
timelineItems.text: LETS GO REDSSSSSSS @TORONTOFC #tfclive http://t.co/bM4lYm8GvJ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dwayne De Rosario (Toronto FC) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jackson with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: Just heard Rapids announcers question Ryan Nelsen's resting of Michael Bradley. He is not being rested. He has a minor injury. #TFC #TORvCOL

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: Best chance of the game thus far goes to TFC. DeRo mistimes his jump on a cross from Jackson, unable to get it on goal. #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by José Mari (Colorado Rapids).
Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Toronto FC. Dwayne De Rosario tries a through ball, but Mark Bloom is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Henry
timelineItems.text: Really positice start from TFC here, pushing quickly up the field even without Bradley in the lineup. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Keith Buderus
timelineItems.text: No Bradley, no Defoe. #Rapids need a result today. This Toronto team was a bottom feeder last season.

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: Unfair to compare Bekker with Bradley but he has been given the role of the 'General' it seems. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Paul Attfield
timelineItems.text: Just like playing for Brazil RT @NeilMDavidson: Pretty much one-way traffic early on. Julio Cesar a spectator in #torontoFC goal #TFClive

timelineItems.desc: Hand ball by Steven Caldwell (Toronto FC).
timelineItems.title: YELLOW: Steven Caldwell hand ball

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Nick LaBrocca.
Hand ball by Steven Caldwell (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Debra Natasha
timelineItems.text: Un poco fútbol para calentar el alma #Toronto #TFC #TFClive http://t.co/hK8vjgv8N7

timelineItems.name: Debra Natasha
timelineItems.text: Un poco fútbol para calentar el alma #Toronto #TFC #TFClive http://t.co/hK8vjgv8N7

timelineItems.name: Cito
timelineItems.text: Gilberto is lightning quick #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: idris sarumoh
timelineItems.text: what a ridiculous yellow card by the ref. wow #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Anthony Tran
timelineItems.text: Stupid yellow for Caldwell, how was he to get his hand out the way when the shot came from the close. Come on. #TFC #TFCLive #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mark Bloom (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Jon Gauthier
timelineItems.text: And! Were off! #TorontoFC v Colorado! Lets go boys #TFClive http://t.co/jdgOMgdCR1

timelineItems.name: Jon Gauthier
timelineItems.text: And! Were off! #TorontoFC v Colorado! Lets go boys #TFClive http://t.co/jdgOMgdCR1

timelineItems.comment: Jeremy Hall (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by José Mari (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Sohan Rai
timelineItems.text: Decent start for us so far. Gilberto is key in this one, already providing nice hold up play again. #tfclive

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Toronto FC 0, Colorado Rapids 1.

timelineItems.name: brad kinzett
timelineItems.text: #TFC deserved better. Really missed the quality of Rey, Defoe and Bradley. Bench showed they can compete with a good side though.

timelineItems.name: Adam Araujo
timelineItems.text: Great preformance by Beckker, tough lost for #TFC

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Great 3 road points =+4 for season, great result #TORvCOL

timelineItems.name: Frank G
timelineItems.text: #TFC still learning what this team consists of. 1 thing for sure, they have no depth. no #bradley no #defoe = losses

timelineItems.desc: The Colorado Rapids head to BMO Field to take on Eastern Conference leaders Toronto FC.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Toronto FC vs. Colorado Rapids | April 12, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @EdsonBuddle strikes late to give @ColoradoRapids 3 points on the road: http://t.co/MPZ32mRp5O #Rapids96 #TORvCOL http://t.co/nVKr6SRkn7

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @EdsonBuddle strikes late to give @ColoradoRapids 3 points on the road: http://t.co/MPZ32mRp5O #Rapids96 #TORvCOL http://t.co/nVKr6SRkn7

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Irwin up strongly on a set piece to punch the ball clear. #Rapids96 GK has been sharp on a few crosses so far. 0-0 (20)

timelineItems.name: John Molinaro
timelineItems.text: Justin Morrow is so good on the ball. #TFC

timelineItems.name: Devang Desai
timelineItems.text: Bekker getting better by the minute #TFClive

timelineItems.name: All on the Pitch
timelineItems.text: Oso is going to have a tough job wrestling the starting gig back from Bekker. #tfclive

timelineItems.name: Sohan Rai
timelineItems.text: Hall has had three opportunities to challenge for the ball, and instead has just marked his man deeper and deeper into our end. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Henry
timelineItems.text: Toronto need to slow it down, control the pace - game getting sloppy right now. #TFC #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: O’Neill/Moor seem to have a stopper/sweeper-like relationship. O’Neill will usually move forward and break up passes, Moor last man back.

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: There's been some good stuff coming from the TFC midfield despite missing Bradley. Kyle Bekker is gonna be real good. #TORvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. José Mari tries a through ball, but Gabriel Torres is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Tom
timelineItems.text: @torontofc Issey never stops running #TFCLive

timelineItems.title: SHOT: Issey Nakajima-Farran’s long shot is deflected

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by José Mari.

timelineItems.name: Dan Riccio
timelineItems.text: TFC's diamond midfield is led by Jeremy Hall as the central attacking midfielder with Bekker in the defensive role. #TFClive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Issey Nakajima-Farran (Toronto FC) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Bradley Orr with a headed pass.
Attempt saved. Mark Bloom (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: Sam
timelineItems.text: Field at TFC looks much better than when I was there for the home opener! #TFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Gaby Torres skies his shot

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: All the focus on Bradley/Defoe, and it’s still the #TFC MF dominating. Passing a concern so far this half- lots of giveaways. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Pitch was in okay shape at the start of match (told it's better now than last game here) but is getting torn up in spots. #Rapids96 0-0 (31)

timelineItems.name: dr. caruso
timelineItems.text: I'm really not liking #TFC's balls forward. Way off the marks.

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Watching #TORvCOL this afternoon. Shockingly, #TFC look kind of different with $100 million worth of talent removed from their lineup.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: scrappy 1st half-hour of #TFC #Rapids, pitch much better than vs. #DCU but far from perfect - game taking on same feel as DCU game #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Gaby Torres drives low and wide

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Not a good half for Torres, frankly. Sloppy on the ball.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by José Mari.

timelineItems.name: Skistheday
timelineItems.text: Issey is NOT impressing me...slow and tripping over his own feet. Substitute please! #TFClive #TFC14

timelineItems.comment: Nathan Sturgis (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Kyle Bekker (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Joshua Kloke
timelineItems.text: Real lack of calm and confidence for #TFC today without Bradley and Defoe.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Bradley Orr.

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: The problem with this narrow midfield for Colorado is it makes the margin of error so small in possession. Everything's so cramped. #TORvCOL

timelineItems.name: Carrie Chassels
timelineItems.text: Dear @torontofc...Is there any way we can bring @marvwynne22 back to the TFC squad? We miss his speed and his overall athleticism #tfclive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Terrific pass from Powers to set up that corner

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Nathan Sturgis with a cross.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Bradley Orr.

timelineItems.name: Mark Tagliaferri
timelineItems.text: No Bradley; no Defoe; no problem. @lidia_b11 #allforone #tfc #bmofield

timelineItems.name: JB #LeafsNationArmy
timelineItems.text: @torontofc Cesar is such a BEAST back there,he's #SoClutch #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Henry
timelineItems.text: Julio Cesar with a big save, but takes it between the legs - the Brazillian feeling that one. #TFC #TFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gilberto (Toronto FC) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Mark Bloom with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Neil Davidson
timelineItems.text: Colorado beginning to make its presence felt a bit at Toronto end as 1st half winds down. #torontoFC #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: Colorado has definitely had the better of the last 15 mins or so. The final ball/finish still missing, like it has been all year. #TORvCOL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Verrry close as Piermayr’s shoulder/Gilberto’s head combine to parry that ball just wide of net. Scoreless 44'

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Dwayne De Rosario (Toronto FC) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Dwayne De Rosario turns and shoots

timelineItems.name: Alejandro Valdes
timelineItems.text: At least we're no longer prone to getting scored on in the first half! Keep it up TFC! #TFClive

timelineItems.name: raoul.saxomophone
timelineItems.text: gilberto for the goooooooalmost #tfclive

timelineItems.name: idris sarumoh
timelineItems.text: #TFClive bekker and back line are solid. Hall and Issey i dont know what is going on with them

timelineItems.name: laurenw
timelineItems.text: Kyle Bekker has stepped up his game, definitely an improvement from last season #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: HALF: 0-0, overall boring opening 45 frankly, both teams playing so-so. Picked up a bit as half went on. Sanchez sorely missed...

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Toronto FC 0, Colorado Rapids 0.

timelineItems.name: raoul.saxomophone
timelineItems.text: great defensive first half for toronto. all nils #tfclive

timelineItems.name: Neil Davidson
timelineItems.text: No score after 45 minutes. Rapids opt for patient buildup. #TorontoFC more direct. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: PT | @torontofc 0-0 @ColoradoRapids... Partido con pocas emociones, más inclinado hacia la visita. #TORvCOL

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: What does 56% of the possession really mean in this game ? #TORvCOL time for route 1

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Toronto FC 0, Colorado Rapids 0.

timelineItems.name: M L R
timelineItems.text: Neilson says concentration is key- well staying awake would help too. GO Reds #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: Looking to see if Jackson and Nakajima-Farran can take advantage of Rapids full backs this half. #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Neil Davidson
timelineItems.text: Four minutes in and we have giveaways galore. On both sides. #torontofc

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Shane O'Neill.

timelineItems.name: Centennial 38 SG
timelineItems.text: #TFC have their hearts set on more possession this half. Pushing up a bit, and there must be room for Buddle, Torres somewhere.

timelineItems.text: This is a good rehearsal for @torontofc line up wise (except for Cesar) for the World Cup weeks. Others must step up then too. #TFClive

timelineItems.text: The crowd is going wild here at #BMO field! Such close calls for boys in red! #TFC!!!

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview a clash of talented midfielders as Toronto FC host the Colorado Rapids. If he plays, will Michael Bradley be able to run free in the attack or will he be too preoccupied on the defensive side of the ball? Find out Saturday at 4pm ET on MLS Live in the US and on TSN and RDS2 in Canada.
timelineItems.title: Toronto FC vs. Colorado Rapids April 12, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Anthony Tran
timelineItems.text: Where was the call? Clearly their was contact from the defender. Horrible missed call from the ref #TFC #TFCLive #MLS

timelineItems.name: Shaun Stuart
timelineItems.text: Toronto FC vs Colorado Rapids #redarmy #torontofc

timelineItems.name: Andrew Kimber
timelineItems.text: So, why exactly are we paying Gilberto to be our # 9? He's been useless for 4 games. #TFCLive #TFC

Attempt missed. Steven Caldwell (Toronto FC) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kyle Bekker with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: idris sarumoh
timelineItems.text: #TFClive man o man can we take a risk now and send in someone Hall. he looks winded. some fresh legs pls

timelineItems.name: Kyle Mayer
timelineItems.text: Bradley or Osorio would have marshalled this match for #TFC.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Dillon Powers is better this year than last. At the center of EVERY goal. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Gilberto (Toronto FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Justin Morrow with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Adam Araujo
timelineItems.text: Jackson . . . The only powerhouse on the pitch #Tfc

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: O’Neill somewhat a victim of his own versatility. Wants to settle into a spot. Another solid performance today could move him back to CB.

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: Toronto FC's bench includes an injured player today. That tells you how injury-ravaged this club is. #TFCLive

timelineItems.name: Rapids South Stands
timelineItems.text: I like that they eased @SernaDillon back into the match. Ready for him to get back into starting XI. #Rapids #TORvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids).
Issey Nakajima-Farran (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Toronto FC. Conceded by Drew Moor.

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: Oh Shane O'Neill please choose to play for #Ireland instead of #usmnt you'd be a very welcome addition #tfc #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Tim Drodge
timelineItems.text: I would sell my soul for a winger. #TFC #TFCLIVE

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Minimum of four minutes added. #TFClive sub, Hamilton on for Bloom. #Rapids96 getting chances on counterattacks. 1-0 (90+)

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Issey Nakajima-Farran (Toronto FC).

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Mastroeni pulled the right buttons with his subs. Don’t love all the CMs to start, but subs have done what they’re supposed to do today.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids).
Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Shane O'Neill (Colorado Rapids).
Gilberto (Toronto FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Kyle Bekker (Toronto FC) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
timelineItems.title: POST: Bekker hits the woodwork from a FK for a second time

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: A set piece in a very dangerous spot for #TFClive. #Rapids96 didn't like the call. Might be the last kick of the game? 1-0 (90+)

timelineItems.comment: Kyle Bekker (Toronto FC) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.text: The post again for Bekker! #fml #TFClive

timelineItems.name: Oohwayy
timelineItems.text: Kyle Becker has nothing to be ashamed of. He'll be a beast and he'll get it next game. Two posts off two free kicks..#TFCLive
